page_content:
Mendix Technology Limited

Mendix Platform

The Mendix Platform is a Rapid Application Development Platform enabling business analysts and developers to create, build, integrate, deploy and manage web and mobile (e.g. iOS and Android) applications. The Mendix Platform is based on a cloud-native architecture offering Hybrid Deployment with Enterprise Reliability, Availability, Security, Performance and Scalability.

Features

  • Rapid Application Delivery Platform for Web and Mobile Business Applications
  • High Control Platform supporting full Application Lifecycle Management
  • One-click deployment allowing seamless provisioning and management of Business Applications
  • Visual model-driven development, promoting communication, productivity, quality and short iterations
  • Open Standards based; UML, BPMN, HTML5, CSS3, REST, SOAP, SAML
  • Fully integrated with CloudFoundry and Amazon Web Services
  • Responsive UI framework with layouts, templates and UI elements

Benefits

  • 6 x higher productivity with 70% less effort required
  • No code, model driven development platform
  • Rapidly build applications, without need for low-level coding
  • High control across the life cycle of the application
  • Safeguarding compatibility of the application and the model
  • Align Business and IT to rapidly deliver application functionality
  • Capture and deploy feedback in minutes
  • Full monitoring for application health

Pricing

£20 per user per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Year
  • Trial and free options available
